content.description: Not to be confused with a wet dream...although the outcome is the same. This thing is classic! Perfectly sculpted holds up a beautiful white streak. Sustaind vertical climbing to the 5th bolt. Stand on the ledge and clip the chains.
content.location:
Middle route on the wall. Starts on a ledge(where you can reach the first bolt)

Then climb the obvious white streak.

content.description: Vertical climbing up grey streak. The crux is right off the deck to the 3rd bolt.(might want a stick clip) Technical footwork on thin crimpy holds. At the 3rd bolt you can start to use the crack system although it stays fairly sustained. Shares the last bolt and anchors with White Dream.
content.location: This route is furthest left up the obvious grey streak.

content.description: Looks better than it climbs but it works for a warmup. Start on the ledge to the right, in the dihedral. A few stemming moves gets you into a pod. Hand jambs to clip the 2nd and 3rd bolts. Then pull out right onto the not so good rail. Trending right onto the face. A few big moves with bad feet gets you to the crux just before the chains.
content.location: Far right on the ledge. Starts in dihedral.
